channel.title: OpenPGP Applet click blocking
channel.description:
When attempting to decrypt a PGP message, the OpenPGP applet in Whonix 16 will disable the entire screen screen, beside the text box and the cancel button. Is this intended behavior, given that it wasn't present in Whonix 15.
If it is, it is a strange design choice since it penalizes users who use long passwords, forcing them to save the message from the clipboard to a file, copy the password, and only then decrypt the message using the gpg2 command on the terminal, instead of directly copying the password from vault.
